#summary Main reference page for MathLibrary
#labels Featured,Phase-Deploy,User-Guide

The library mimics GLSL so it is easy to use. Additional benefit of being similar to GLSL is that you can recycle your skills using a familiar set of concepts. If you are new to GLSL then using simplex3d math library should make it easier for you to use GLSL in the future.
